ygData.subject: Sorta good news here
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I sorta got good news. I went to the comp shop I was telling ya ll about. They ve got some decent prices on computer components, but they don t sell
ygData.messageBody:
Well I sorta got good news. I went to the comp shop I was telling
ya'll about. They've got some decent prices on computer components,
but they don't sell complete systems. I guess this is good since I
only want a new motherboard and chip. (I also have to but a case as
they won't install anything that isn't theirs, ie. their motherboard
and chip into my case with my hard drive etc,.) I am looking at
about $200.00-$230.00, but I will also be selling them my case and
old mother board and chip so that price may go down about say $50.00?
Anyway I told them that I would be back in in four weeks to get
everything, so keep your fingers crossed for me ok? (The reason for
four weeks is that rent is due in two weeks, so I'll have to wait
till after rent.) The Raven

P.S. I can't remember who had asked me to call EQ about my account.
At this moment I am not too worried if my characters are wiped out.
Right now I just want to play the game! And yes I am still being
charged monthly for the game. Since my c/c is a debit card I can see
if it is being charged, and it is.
